thread.title_full: Vidya Balan in a Rajinikanth film? | Zee News

title: Vidya Balan in a Rajinikanth film? | Zee News
text:
Vidya Balan in a Rajinikanth film? By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 14:27 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Megastar Rajinikanth might be soon seen in a film directed by 'Kabali' helmed PA Ranjith. And the latest buzz around the project is that talented actress Vidya Balan is reportedly playing the female lead in the film. 
According to Times of India, while the cast of the yet-to-be titled venture is still under wraps, there is a strong word that Vidya might be roped in to play the lead. The report quotes a source as saying, "The makers of the film met Vidya Balan recently, and have finalised her as the lead. However, they are still working on the dates, and only then the official agreement would be signed." MUST READ 
Not much is known about the project. Can it be the sequel to 'Kabali', well only time will tell! First Published: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 14:27 More from zeenews
